Mohahaa, for me it works, i am on chapter one now...
Just read instructions once more and you will be fine.

Install the disks, run the game like normal, then after the game started, close it, apply crack, start it, log in, PLAY

It DOES work with the multi dvd release.
Before patching, update the game first (by pressing left button after running PlayMaxPayne3.exe)
After patching, you will be asked to recover key, type any number in the text field and it will proceed.
A rockstar social club account is still needed to get pass the login screen (after login, press ESC to start the game)

Using "MULTI 10" retail DVD copy. Had some trouble with various cracks, however this one worked. You have to make sure you do NOT block in your firewall settings. It will ask you to activate, type anything in the activation window (I put "activated"). Then login to social club (you must create an account at socialclub.rockstargames.com). Hit escape and the game will start.
